title: Multiparametric MRI radiomics predicts neoadjuvant response in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma
authors: Li H; Zhang Q; Chen Y
key_findings: Baseline multiparametric radiomics combined with clinical stage improved prediction of pathologic complete response to chemoradiotherapy.

title: Deep learning fusion of CT and MRI for cT staging in esophageal adenocarcinoma
authors: Garcia M; Khan S; Patel R
key_findings: Cross-modality attention network reduced staging errors versus radiologist assessment by 18%.

title: Hybrid MRI-CT radiomics nomogram for recurrence risk in locally advanced esophageal cancer
authors: Wang L; Sun P; Huang J
key_findings: Combined MRI texture and CT shape descriptors improved recurrence prediction AUC to 0.87.

title: Transformer-based multimodal imaging model for esophageal cancer survival
key_findings: Temporal fusion of longitudinal CT and MRI scans outperformed Cox baselines by 9% C-index.
